<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition>true</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">u_custom_stateCHANGESTOResubmitted^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_custom_state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="Resubmitted"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Custem State Trigger</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var flowAPI = sn_fd.FlowAPI;
gs.info("subflow start");
var inputs = {
  item_sys_id: current.getUniqueValue()
};
//flowAPI.startSubflow('5724bada83fd6e1016455a55eeaad398', inputs);

//sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow('5724bada83fd6e1016455a55eeaad398', inputs, 'x_1758036_scriptin');
sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow('request_a_resubmit_item_after_rejected', inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-31 09:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ebb4f61e83fd6e1016455a55eeaad3df</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Custem State Trigger</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ScriptingDemo3" source="x_1758036_scriptin">c180d6418339e61016455a55eeaad37c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ScriptingDemo3">c180d6418339e61016455a55eeaad37c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ebb4f61e83fd6e1016455a55eeaad3df</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-10 03:04:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ebb4f61e83fd6e1016455a55eeaad3df"/></record_update>
